name: Cheddar Spinach Bell Pepper Spicy Buns
description: These cheddar spinach bell pepper spicy buns make a great snack. Fill with your favorite sandwich fillings or have them on their own. Vegan Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup spinach chopped or frozen cut leaf

recipeInstructions.text: Warm 1/2 cup of water and add in the yeast. Mix well and let sit for 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Warm 1/2 cup of water and add in the yeast. Mix well and let sit for 10 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, mix the flours and spices and keep aside.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, mix the flours and spices and keep aside.

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, melt 1 teaspoon butter and lightly cook the bell pepper and chili for 5 minutes until the bell pepper starts to brown on the edges.
recipeInstructions.name: In a pan, melt 1 teaspoon butter and lightly cook the bell pepper and chili for 5 minutes until the bell pepper starts to brown on the edges.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the spinach, pinch of salt and some garlic powder and cook for another 2 minutes. Keep the mixture to cool before adding to the flours.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the spinach, pinch of salt and some garlic powder and cook for another 2 minutes. Keep the mixture to cool before adding to the flours.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the cooled bell pepper spinach mixtures to the flours.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the cooled bell pepper spinach mixtures to the flours.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the shredded cheese and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the shredded cheese and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the yeast mixture and knead into a soft dough. Add more water if needed.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the yeast mixture and knead into a soft dough. Add more water if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: Place dough in well greased and covered container for an hour to rise until doubled.
recipeInstructions.name: Place dough in well greased and covered container for an hour to rise until doubled.

recipeInstructions.text: Punch the dough down and make small balls.
recipeInstructions.name: Punch the dough down and make small balls.

recipeInstructions.text: Tuck the sides of each ball under to get a better upward rise from the bun.
recipeInstructions.name: Tuck the sides of each ball under to get a better upward rise from the bun.

recipeInstructions.text: Place the balls half an in inch apart on a baking tray.
recipeInstructions.name: Place the balls half an in inch apart on a baking tray.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover with towel and let rise for another 45 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Cover with towel and let rise for another 45 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 360 degrees F for about 25 minutes or until the tops are brown and the buns sound hollow!
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 360 degrees F for about 25 minutes or until the tops are brown and the buns sound hollow!

recipeInstructions.text: Enjoy with butter, olive oil or just a toasted snack!!
recipeInstructions.name: Enjoy with butter, olive oil or just a toasted snack!!

keywords: cheese bread, spicy bread, vegetable bread
